name: Jaculus
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The jaculus makes one jaws attack and one claws attack.

actions.name: Jaws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Spearhead
special_abilities.desc: If the jaculus moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and hits that target with a jaws attack on the same turn, the jaws attack does an extra 4 (1d8) piercing damage.
